metadata.title: CVE-2019-5802 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of download origins in Navigation in Google Chrome priorto 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
